Question
========

In a class there are 50 students. Each time, the teacher randomly chooses one student to answer one question and then the teacher puts the chosen name not back. There are a total of three questions. What is then the probability that Marja is chosen to answer the first question? (Give your answer in the form of a fraction: X/Y).

Solution
========

The correct answer is: 0.02
